{{Redirect|El comegente|the Soulfly song|El Comegente}} {{refimprove|date=April 2018}} {{Infobox serial killer | name = Dorángel Vargas | image = | caption = | birth_name = José Dorángel Vargas Gomez | alias = El comegente
Hannibal Lecter of the Andes | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1956|5|14}} | birth_place = [[Caño Zancudo]],
[[Mérida (state)|Mérida]],
[[Venezuela]] | death_date = | cause = | victims = 14 | country = [[Venezuela]] | states = | beginyear = 1997 | endyear = 1999 | apprehended = February 1999 | penalty = }} '''José Dorángel Vargas Gomez''' (born May 14, 1956), {{cite web|url = http://www.absurddiari.com/s/llegir.php?llegir=llegir&ref=5673|title = El caníbal de los Andes confiesa: "Comer gente es como comer peras"|publisher = L'absurd Diari|date = 19 November 2004|language = Spanish|website = absurddiari.com|accessdate = 10 September 2008}} known as "El comegente" (lit. ''people eater'') and the "[[Hannibal Lecter]] of the [[Andes]]", {{cite web|url = http://findarticles.com/p/articles/mi_qn4156/is_19990228/ai_n13936195|title = Andes cannibal CARACAS|publisher = [[Internet Archive]]|website = findarticles.com|accessdate = 10 September 2008|url-status = dead|archiveurl = https://web.archive.org/web/20090803033007/http://findarticles.com/p/articles/mi_qn4156/is_19990228/ai_n13936195|archivedate = 3 August 2009}} is a [[serial killer]] and [[Human cannibalism|cannibal]] in [[Venezuela]]. He was a [[Homelessness|homeless]] man who used to hunt passersby at a park in the city of [[San Cristóbal, Táchira|San Cristobal]], [[Táchira]]. Once he was caught, he confessed to killing and eating at least eleven men over a period of two years preceding his arrest in 1999. {{cite web|url = https://cronicasdeltanato.wordpress.com/el-canibal-de-los-andes/|title = Dorancel Vargas El Comegente|publisher = Cronicas del Tanato|date = 10 February 2012|language = Spanish|website = cronicasdeltanato.wordpress.com|accessdate = 5 December 2014}} == Biography == Dorángel Vargas was born in 1956 to poor farmers. His priors included three arrests, two of them for minor offenses (theft of chickens and cattle). The third was acquired in 1995 when he was admitted to the Institute of Psychiatric Rehabilitation Peribeca for the murder of Baltazar Cruz Moreno, and the subsequent cannibalism of his body. He managed to escape from that center, and lead a seemingly normal life in poverty. It is believed that he was actively murdering men between November 1998 and January 1999. Vargas hunted victims with a tube-shaped spear and occasionally with rocks. He kept the parts that he could cook and usually buried the feet, hands and heads. It seemed that his primary targets were unsuspecting athletes and laborers working on the riverbank. He did not eat women or children, and when asked why, he explained that he felt that they were too "pure" to consume. {{cite book|author = Nicki Peter Petrikowski|title = Cannibal Serial Killers|year = 2016|publisher = Enslow Pub Inc|isbn = 9780766072824|page = 104}} Since he had no place to store the human flesh, most of it would decompose quickly, which made him kill routinely. On February 12, 1999, members of the [[civil defense]] found the remains of two young people and alerted the security forces. Searching around the same area, the remains of six more bodies were found. Hypotheses about the findings included the plot being a cemetery for corpses linked to drug gangs and even a burial ground for victims of Satanic cult rituals. The victims, after further investigation, were all found to have been missing persons. As the investigation progressed, Vargas became a suspect. An inspection of the shack that he was living in near the area revealed several vessels containing human flesh and viscera prepared for consumption, along with three human heads and several feet and hands. In 2016, Vargas was involved in a prison riot in which he killed two other inmates and served their remains to other inmates. {{cite web|url = http://www.foxnews.com/world/2016/10/14/man-claims-son-was-eaten-by-fellow-inmates-during-riot-in-venezuelan-prison.html|title = Man claims son was eaten by fellow inmates during riot in Venezuelan prison|last = Vasquez|first = Alex|publisher = [[Fox News]]|date = 14 October 2016|website = foxnews.com|accessdate = 13 April 2019}} {{Cite news|url = https://www.reuters.com/article/us-venezuela-cannibalism/venezuela-probes-reports-of-prison-cannibal-deaths-idUSKBN12H1SZ|title = Venezuela probes reports of prison cannibal deaths|last = Polanco|first = Anggy|publisher = [[Reuters]]|date = 17 October 2016|newspaper = Reuters|accessdate = 13 April 2019}} == References == {{Reflist}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Vargas, Dorángel}} [[Category:1956 births]] [[Category:1990s murders in Venezuela]] [[Category:1997 crimes in Venezuela]] [[Category:1997 murders in South America]] [[Category:Homeless people]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Male serial killers]] [[Category:People convicted of murder by Venezuela]] [[Category:People with schizophrenia]] [[Category:Venezuelan cannibals]] [[Category:Venezuelan people convicted of murder]] [[Category:Venezuelan serial killers]] {{crime-bio-stub}} {{venezuela-bio-stub}}
